attributes.action: STOP UK fiancé & spouse visa Financial Requirements from rising to 29K from 18K
attributes.additional_details: I want the government to think wisely about the decision they’ve made & to reconsider it so the whole UK agree, because if it’s going to continue people are going to leave this country and never come back especially the people who are already BRITISH CITIZENS like me as our own country & government can’t look after us or support us when we do so much for the government already. If you’re not going to reconsider your decision then give everyone a pay rise with a minimum starting salary of £29K
attributes.background: There’s been a huge jump in price for the change of financial requirements in the UK for a fiancé and spouse visa so now its been made so difficult for the people in the UK to now call their partners or spouses to the UK. There aren’t many jobs out here that even offer £29K so what do people do?

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653641
